alert.note: Alert for Cabarrus; Mecklenburg (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 9:02PM EDT until June 26 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Cabarrus County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... Northern Mecklenburg County in the Piedmont of North Carolina... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 902 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles west of Huntersville, or near Stanley, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Huntersville, Concord, Northeast Charlotte, Harrisburg, University City, Charlotte Motor Speedway, Coddle Creek Reservoir, Ramsey Creek Park and Croft. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
